name: ECO CITY
description:
Eco City is a fresh mix of the farm manager and city builder with an emphasis on building a green, eco-friendly town environment. Grow a sustainable economy by cultivating organic fruits and vegetables, build production lines and develop a network of clean renewable energy!

As a mayor of a big farm town turning into a prosperous green megapolis, you will build businesses that work in harmony with a natural environment. Plant and harvest pesticide-free and GMO-free fruits and veggies, sell them on local farmers market or cook delicious meals. Construct solar panels and wind turbines to provide your city with green power. Grow trees or even entire forests to get rid of the air pollution, and of course, don't forget about recycling!

Building an ecological balance with natural systems is not the only thing you can do in Eco City, there is so much more! Build and develop a beautiful sea coastal line to attract tourists and to create a summer beach paradise. Fulfill orders with your ships and automobiles. Grow cows, feed them with fresh hay, milk them and make healthy dairy products or grow apple trees and wheat to make the best apple pie in the world. Reestablish an old university. Build roads, schools, hospitals, police stations and decorations to turn your town into a green city of your dreams!

Features:
- simple and easy to play
- ability to play with friends
- hundreds of buildings and decorations to unlock
- beautiful graphics
- play for free, any time of the day or night, anywhere!
- an entertaining story-driven progression from small rural town to a thriving metropolis
- dozens of different types of crops (corn, wheat, strawberries, ...) and dozens of recipes to turn them into healthy delicious meals
- dozens of cars and ships to make deliveries
- hundreds of tasks, including unique daily tasks
